text:
I'm finding a slow memory leak using Tomcat. I can't tell you where, but using 
Windows Task Manager, I can see Tomcat creeping up from about 45M to 120M 
memory usage over about 5 days.  It's mostly idle (not a lot of hits against 
the website it supports).

I'm running MS Win2k Adv Server; Tomcat 5.5.9; isapi redirector 1.2.13; J2SE  
1.5.0.03; JDBC 3.1.8a.

What else do you need to know?
creator: mail@proleon.com

text:
There is far from enough information to even begin to know where to look. The
leak, if indeed there is one, could be in Tomcat or in any application you have
deployed on Tomcat.

Please follow this up on the tomcat-user list.

As a minimum to re-open this report, we are going to need an easy to use test
case that clearly demonstrates the problem or the results from a profiler
indicating which objects are not being released when they should.
creator: markt@apache.org
